TopicTitle: Kerbin Kolonization Konglomerate - Space Station/Base building Collab

Articles.Content:
I am kind of confused though. I thought the hab and one of the tanks had already been launched. But the "Updated persist" in the OP was empty, and the original persist only had the core...

Huh. Weird. Perhaps try the one Weegee posted a few pages back?
I won't update the gallery, but I am fine to launch it again and update the download. I'll have a look at it.
The main DL should be working. it's late here so I'll check it sometime between now and the End of TimeTM.

Right. I have used Weegee's persist, and I am redoing the mission. Persist updated in a mo.

-Up to date persistence.sfs-

(Sorry about using mediafire. I don't have a dropbox account.)

The Google.doc has been updated as well. (Someone had listed me as lifting the remaining fuel tank. 0.o I have been saying the entire time I was lifting the KH4 [Kethane] tank.)

Edited January 28, 2014 by Deathsoul097
Sorry for not launching fuel tank 2 to the station, I have been very busy with school lately.

I had finals last week. Just make sure that you keep tabs with us . Everyone was waiting for a reply and didn't get one for like 5 days.

Its all cool with me tho. Xetalim can you write a quick sentence under your name in the google doc?

Has anyone heard from baberbot?

Edited January 28, 2014 by Avera9eJoe

Sorry for not launching fuel tank 2 to the station, I have been very busy with school lately.

So can you launch it now, or should we launch another module first/assign the tank to someone else?

Really sorry about being about to help with this build anything that used the graphic card crashed my PC by overheating it. it is fixed now. I now it wont happen again as I know how to fix it now.

sorry for the disruption my laptop has caused.
I'm capable of lunching stuff now if I am still needed for this build

Really sorry about being about to help with this build anything that used the graphic card crashed my PC by overheating it. it is fixed now. I now it wont happen again as I know how to fix it now.

sorry for the disruption my laptop has caused.

Well, I certainly know the feeling. I've burnt out a graphics card or two (and I use high end NVidias too!). No worries. Thanks for getting back with us.

Baberbot ask Deathsoul when you can launch.

I have some suggestions on PL order/project plans.

Mun station, Minmus station, Mun base, then Minmus base, then probably on Duna or Ike.

Edited January 28, 2014 by Avera9eJoe

Baberbot ask Deathsoul when you can launch.

I have some suggestions on PL order/project plans.

Mun station, Minmus station, Mun base, then Minmus base, then probably on Duna or Ike.

You can suggest all you want, but not even I, the master rulekeeper, am able to have a say in that. a person't choice of project is exactly what they want it to be and nothing else. I'm contemplating building a Minmus base for tourism, no kethane gear! I'm also toying with the idea of opening up interplanetary when my turn comes and starting a Gilly base or LEO (Low Eve Orbit) space station). I also thought about doing a polar space station just for kicks.

I'm contemplating building a Minmus base for tourism, no kethane gear!

Awesome! All that pudding colored ground... Yeah your totally right I just think it'd make more sense if the PL order was chronological (if that's a relatively good word).

*edit: who is really currently launching? Deathsoul?

I only wanted the base pack, the others are a bit too futuristic.

Also, yes I am finished, and the most recent persistence.sfs is in my last post, I believe.
